data.title: Andrea Duilio - Chief Executive Officer, Italy at Sky Group
data.meta_description: Andrea Duilio, joined Sky Italia as Chief Executive Officer in September 2021.
data.text:
Andrea Duilio, joined Sky Italia as Chief Executive Officer in September 2021.

A graduate of Bocconi University, Andrea built most of his career at Vodafone Italia where he held a number of leadership roles, including Chief Executive Officer of ho. Mobile, and developed a strong customer-focused approach.

At Vodafone Italia, as Digital Director he led the company’s digital transformation process. He later took on the role of Commercial Operations Director, focused on innovating client relations and interaction.

Prior to joining Sky, he managed the company’s commercial and brand strategy as Consumer Business Unit Director.
